meanings.definition: Of or relating to an inscription.
meanings.sent1: The inscriptional words on the stone tablet were ancient and mysterious.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed many inscriptional artifacts from different civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The inscriptional message on the tombstone made the visitors wonder about the person buried there.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an inscriptional symbol of joy that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The inscriptional carvings on the temple walls told stories of gods and heroes.

meanings.sent1: The inscriptional plaques on the building described its historical significance.
meanings.sent2: The library's walls were covered in inscriptional writings from various time periods.
meanings.sent3: The inscriptional notes on the map guided the travelers through the forest.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a library of inscriptional memories etched with moments of happiness and sorrow.
meanings.sent5: The inscriptional details on the map helped the explorers navigate the treacherous terrain.

meanings.definition: Written or engraved on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The inscriptional message on the monument honored the fallen soldiers.
meanings.sent2: The inscriptional letters on the ancient scroll were barely legible.
meanings.sent3: The inscriptional graffiti on the wall caught the attention of passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like an inscriptional promise of eternal friendship.
meanings.sent5: The inscriptional symbols on the cave walls revealed the secrets of the lost civilization.
